objects.title: Good News - Power
objects.creator: Frank B. Robinson
objects.description: Psychiana radio program episode begins with assurance that there is a Power that can get people what they desire. Robinson then discusses his early life failures and childhood seeking of some force that could turn his failures into success. He asserts the God-Power can turn our failures into success and bring us material and spiritual abundance.
objects.subject: Frank B. Robinson; Failure; Success; Material Abundance
objects.source: Psychiana Digital Collection, Digital Initiatives, University of Idaho Library

objects.title: University of Idaho vs. University of Southern California (Football), 10/30/1925

objects.description: Idaho Football vs. University of Southern California 10/30/1925 at Neale Stadium in Moscow, ID. Score: 7 - 51 (L).
objects.subject: American Football
objects.source: Vandal Video Collection, Digital Initiatives, University of Idaho Library
